card.name: Death Gate, Gate of Hell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Iron Arm Tribe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.

card.name: Iron Arm Tribe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.

card.name: DNA Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ If you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

card.name: Bolshack Superhero
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all non-psychic creatures that have power 3000 or less. Then destroy all psychic creatures that have power 5000 or less. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Volg Thunder

card.name: Volg Tiger, Thunder Beast
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand. Then choose a creature that costs less than the discarded card in your graveyard and put it into the battle zone. ■ Link Release

card.name: Hyperspatial White Blue Hole
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ If you put a light psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, you may add a card in your hand to your shields face down. ■ If you put a water psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, this turn, your creatures can't be blocked.

card.name: Hyperspatial Green White Hole
card.text: ■ Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ If you put a light psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. ■ If you put a nature psychic creature into the battle zone in this way, you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Formation in the Springs
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ If you have a water or nature creature in the battle zone, put a creature that costs 5 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. Otherwise, put a creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.
